home.title: Example TG MiniApp
home.description:
This is a simple repository that can be used as a starting point for your project.
The template is based on Vue.js and includes a UI library and an icon set. For convenience, the template uses an ORM client for PostgreSQL and MinIO as an S3-compatible data store, which can be further integrated with the database. FastApi is used to handle API endpoints, and AioGram (in Python) is used for interacting with the Telegram API.
home.hint: To check the API status, you can open the menu tab via the button on the dock or click the button.

menu.title: Menu
menu.files_hint: Upload, download and manage your files
menu.bot_hint: Send messages to your Telegram bot

link_dialog.hint: Scan a QR code or enter a login code from another device

auth.title: Login to Snipla
auth.hint: Scan this QR-code in authorized app or enter the code
auth.locked_description: To get access for this resourse you need authorise

accept_login.title: Confirm login
accept_login.hint: Make sure you trust the device. Your account could be compromised if you confirm a login you did not initiate.
accept_login.qr_detected: Login session detected from QR code
accept_login.not_found: Login session not found or expired
accept_login.accept_failed: Failed to confirm login. Try again.
accept_login.not_authorized: You need to be logged in to confirm a login

api_keys.title: API Keys
api_keys.hint: Create and manage API keys for programmatic access to your account.

create_dialog.title: New API key
create_dialog.hint: Give your key a descriptive name so you can identify it later.

reveal.title: Key created!
reveal.hint: Copy this key now. You won't be able to see it again.
